Implement a global basic income: As the ruler of the world, I would establish a universal basic income (UBI) to ensure that every individual has access to a basic level of financial security. This would help to alleviate poverty, reduce inequality, and provide a safety net for those who are struggling. The UBI could be funded through a combination of taxes and other sources of revenue, such as a global wealth tax.

Establish a world government: To address the complex global challenges we face, I would work towards establishing a world government that can coordinate and manage global affairs more effectively. This government could be based on a democratic model, with representatives elected by the people of the world. This would provide a more unified and effective response to issues such as climate change, economic inequality, and social injustice.

Promote sustainable development: As ruler of the world, I would prioritize sustainable development and work towards creating a more environmentally-friendly and sustainable future. This would involve investing in renewable energy, reducing carbon emissions, and promoting sustainable agriculture and resource management. By taking these steps, we can ensure that the needs of the present are met without compromising the ability of future generations to meet their own needs.

Implement a global education system: To ensure that everyone has access to quality education, I would work towards creating a global education system that is inclusive, equitable, and effective. This would involve developing curricula that are relevant to the needs of the 21st century, investing in teacher training and development, and providing access to education for all. By doing so, we can help to create a more informed and engaged global population, and promote social mobility and economic growth.

Establish a global healthcare system: As ruler of the world, I would prioritize the establishment of a global healthcare system that provides access to quality healthcare for all. This would involve investing in healthcare infrastructure, developing new treatments and technologies, and promoting healthy lifestyles and behaviors. By doing so, we can help to reduce the burden of disease and promote global health and well-being.
